r.d: An interface for communicating with Twitter's public API. Send status updates, fetch information, add friends, etc.
r.n:
New Features: ------------- * OAuth support [shupp] * SSL support [izi]
Fixes/improvements: ------------------- * Fixed a bug in UTF8 detection [izi] * Fixed some unit tests [izi] * make use of setOption/getOption internally instead of manipulating the options array directly [izi]
